item.title: AI lawsuit against Google parent Alphabet highlights growing legal trend

item.title: Tesla Model Y issue put children in danger, leading to new NHTSA probe
item.description: An issue with the Tesla Model Y door handle forced four parents to break the vehicle's window to get to their children.
